title: Stay Alive
genres: Horror, Fantasy, Mystery, Science Fiction, Thriller
overview: After the brutal death of a friend, a group of friends find themselves in possession of a video-game called "Stay Alive," a blood-curdling true story of a 17th century noblewoman known as the Blood Countess. After playing the game when they know they shouldn't, however, the friends realize that once they die in the game â€” they die for real!
